section.p: Used to set watermark and background image properties for live video.
Used to set the watermark and background image properties for live video.
Used to set the properties of watermark and background images in live video.
Used to set the watermark and background image properties for live video.

plentry.pd: HTTP/HTTPS URL of the image on the live video. The character length must not exceed 1024 bytes.
The x-coordinate (px) of the image on the video frame, with the top-left corner of the output video as the origin.
The y-coordinate (px) of the image on the video frame, with the top-left corner of the output video as the origin.
The width (px) of the image on the video frame.
The height (px) of the image on the video frame.

Layer number of the watermark or background image. When adding one or more watermarks using an array, you must set a value for zOrder, with a valid range of [1,255], otherwise the SDK will report an error. In other cases, zOrder is optional, with a valid range of [0,255], where 0 is the default. 0 indicates the bottom layer, and 255 indicates the top layer.

Transparency of the watermark or background image. Range: [0.0, 1.0]:
0.0: Fully transparent.
1.0: (Default) Fully opaque.
The HTTP/HTTPS URL of the image on the live video. The character length must not exceed 1024 bytes.
The x-coordinate (px) of the image on the video frame, using the top-left corner of the output video frame as the origin.
The y-coordinate (px) of the image on the video frame, using the top-left corner of the output video frame as the origin.
The width (px) of the image on the video frame.
The height (px) of the image on the video frame.

The z-order of the watermark or background image. When adding one or more watermarks using an array, you must assign a value to zOrder, with a valid range of [1,255], otherwise the SDK will report an error. In other cases, zOrder is optional, with a valid range of [0,255], where 0 is the default. 0 indicates the bottom layer, and 255 indicates the top layer.

The transparency of the watermark or background image. Valid range is [0.0, 1.0]:
0.0: Fully transparent.
1.0: (Default) Fully opaque.
The HTTP/HTTPS URL of the image on the live video. The character length must not exceed 1024 bytes.
The x-coordinate (px) of the image on the video frame, using the top-left corner of the output video frame as the origin.
The y-coordinate (px) of the image on the video frame, using the top-left corner of the output video frame as the origin.
The width (px) of the image on the video frame.
The height (px) of the image on the video frame.

The layer index of the watermark or background image. When adding one or more watermarks using a watermark array, you must assign a value to zOrder. The valid range is [1,255]; otherwise, the SDK will report an error. In other cases, zOrder is optional. The valid range is [0,255], with 0 as the default. 0 represents the bottom layer, and 255 represents the top layer.

The transparency of the watermark or background image. The valid range is [0.0,1.0]:
0.0: Fully transparent.
1.0: (Default) Fully opaque.
HTTP/HTTPS address of the image on the live video. The character length must not exceed 1024 bytes.
The x-coordinate (in px) of the image on the video frame, with the top-left corner of the output video frame as the origin.
The y-coordinate (in px) of the image on the video frame, with the top-left corner of the output video frame as the origin.
The width (in px) of the image on the video frame.
The height (in px) of the image on the video frame.

Z-order of the watermark or background image. When using an array of watermarks to add one or more watermarks, you must assign a value to zOrder, with a valid range of [1,255], otherwise the SDK will report an error. In other cases, zOrder is optional, with a valid range of [0,255]. 0 is the default value. 0 represents the bottom layer, and 255 represents the top layer.

Transparency of the watermark or background image. Value range is [0.0,1.0]:
0.0: Fully transparent.
1.0: (Default) Fully opaque.
